Introduction

Sowon, born Kim So-jung, is a South Korean singer and rapper. She was the leader, vocalist, and rapper of GFRIEND, which was under Source Music.

She debuted as the leader of GFRIEND on January 15, 2015, with the EP Season of Glass.

GFRIEND disbanded on May 22, 2021, after all members left Source Music following the completion of their six-year contract.

On August 2, 2021, it was announced that Sowon had signed with IOK Company as an actress, using her birth name. She left IOK Company on September 1, 2022.

On November 15, 2022, it was announced that Sowon had signed with OUI Entertainment as an actress, and would be using the stage name Kim Sowon.

Fun facts

1
Sowon mentioned in Idol Room ep. 34 that she is 172.8cm (5’8.3″) and her legs are 113cm (3’8″). She is said to have one of the longest pair of legs among female idols
